# print-progress

## Install
```bash
npm install 'print-progress'
```

## Usage
```js
var progress = require('print-progress')

progress('Doing task one')         // doing
progress.doing('Doing task one')   // same as above
progress.done('Doing task one')    // when done
progress.fail('Doing task one')    // when failed

progress.configure({delay: 200})   // delay progress switch by 200ms
```
